property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Evolution - Put on one of your multicolored creatures. Double Breaker When your opponent would put a non-multicolored creature into the battle zone, instead of the battle zone it is put into the graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Double Breaker When a God in your battle zone is destroyed, you may return it to your hand. God Link - Zen, Transcendent God (Left Side) When this creature attacks while linked, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Vortex Evolution - Put on two of your multi-colored creatures. This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Meteor Burn - When you summon a non-evolution multicolored creature you may put one of the cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, you may search your
deck and put a creature of the same name as the creature you put into your graveyard from your deck into the battle zone. Double Breaker

property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, return all other creatures to their owner's hands except for multicolored creatures.

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Your multicolored creatures break an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
This card is put into the mana zone tapped. [Blocker] Blocker Double Breaker God Link - Aku, Ultimate God (Right Side) (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and
abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked it gets "Quad Breaker" and untaps at the end of your turn.

property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone, destroy all creatures with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone you may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you don't, return this creature to your hand. When this creature is destroyed, draw 4 cards. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
This turn, ignore any effects that would prevent your creatures from attacking your opponent. (For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say
"This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players." Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Mystery Totem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your nature creatures can't be blocked by creatures with less power. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. [Blocker] Blocker At the end of your turn, you may untap all of your creatures with "Blocker". God Link - Orbital, the Supreme God or Chemical, God of Sublimity (Right Side) While this creature is linked, when your creatures with "Blocker" are destroyed, instead of putting them in your graveyard you may return them to your hand.

god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, it gains "Double Breaker".

This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Evolution - Put on one of your multicolored creatures. When this creature is put into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures with a cost of 5 or less, or put one of your opponent's cross gears of cost 5 or less into
your opponent's graveyard. However, a multi-colored card may not be chosen by this effect. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Double Breaker When this creature attacks, your opponent chooses one card in his hand and discards it. God Link - Underworld, the Greatest God or Protege, the Finest God (Left Side) (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each
god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, it gains "Triple Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may return 1 God from your mana zone to your hand. If all the cards tapped are nature cards, this creature gets +4000 power this turn.

When this creature is destroyed you may choose and activate one of the following effects: Choose up to two of your opponents creatures and tap them OR return two of your opponent's creatures to their owner's hand OR search your deck for up to two creatures with a cost of 3 or less, show them to your opponent, and add them to your hand. Then, shuffle your
deck.
